Activity: Wake up and prepare for the final sprint!
Check emails, and prepare the final changes to the game.
Final review and polish of all the enemy character designs, attack animations, UI concepts, and character models. Make sure everything is consistent and high-quality.
Prepare a presentation to showcase the work done this week to the team.
Present the work to the team and gather feedback for final improvements. @lpro-1 and @cdev-1, let's make this game amazing!
Address the final feedback and make any necessary adjustments to the designs, animations, models, and UI elements.
Final documentation and archiving of all the assets created this week. Preparing for the next week.
Wrap up the week! Celebrate a productive week with the team and head home for some well-deserved rest and relaxation.
